data.title: Free Dirt!  U Haul
data.description:
Nice pile of "new" dirt. 
Very few if any rocks, 
No living weeds (some grass scrapings) 
piled next to the driveway. 
take all or some, I don't care 
There is about a heaping full size pickup truck load ready to go! 
thanks!
